strings.Value: "One evening without fresh meat, and everyone becomes desperate. Your grip upon life is so easily loosened!"
"Judging by the wry faces around me, no one went hunting today. Well, perhaps at least this will help you see how frail our existence is..."
"It's only food. Find another reason to moan."
"Eat quietly! Can't spit around here without hitting a fanatic. Can't I eat without a sermon?!"
"Some day death will find us all. But so what? Life's cruelty is neither a divine revelation nor cause to lament."
"I'd fight a giant over a piece of meat right now â€” and I wouldn't turn away from a stale piece of bread either. Slavery will do that to you, ha, ha, ha!"
